comment.author: 75896071@N00
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Intelligent Travel - National Geographic Traveler's blog, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 41888259@N06
comment._content: This photo is amazing, that area looks pretty much the same. To the immediate left, out of frame, is the post office (now). If you make a right up that street is All Saints Cathedral and school. Went there from 8th-12th (class of '96)

comment.author: 36222865@N07
comment._content: This is part of the Charlotte Amalia Historic District, listed on the National Register of Historic Places. www.nps.gov/history/nr/travel/prvi/pr30.htm

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: National Register: Thank you for your identification of  the Amalia Historic District.  We will update our description of this image.
